column5: Could someone please tell me if it is legal to bring across Frozen Shiners or Chubs? I tried to open a link to the regs, but it doesn't seem to be working.
No problem with dead bait, but any live bait is a no-no.
yep..scorpio right...try this following link for the regswww.mnr.gov.on.caclick on english then click on lets go fishing

Several years ago I tried bringing frozen smelt across.After a complete search of our pick-up they finally let us cross with them.They say their lakes are infested with smelt from people like myself.Supposedly the eggs can survive freezing and hatch the following sring!!A common minnow might be ok but would still check the regulations, I think they are stricter on this now.Just my .02 cents.
